resources.string: FakeStandby requires this service to make it possible to run on every screen and in every app. This feature will only used to provide the functionality of the app and will not access, save, collect or share any of the data.
The Accessibility Service is not running
The Accessibility Service for FakeStandby is not running correctly. Please restart your device.
The Accessibility Service is not enabled

The Accessibility Service for FakeStandby is not enabled in the accessibility settings of your device. To run the app that service has to be enabled. Simply open the accessibility settings, scroll down to FakeStandby and enable it. On some devices you may look for the option under \"installed services\"

The app is not permitted to display overlays over other apps. In order to to run the app you need to grant the \"Display over other apps\" permission for FakeStandby. The permission makes it possible for the app to display content over the content of other apps. To grant the permission enable the switch on the following screen.
Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
